phrases: Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
For some reason, it is come to this...
And I do not know how...
I really do not understand how I was the one to suggest it...
If I were to say something like let us stop here now...
I-It is embarrassing, so turn around.
You have not taken anything off.
I will take everything off one by one...
I cannot believe I said something as stupid...
But at a time like this...
B-But... I do not know where to look.
Just think of it like you are at the beach.
You are on the sandy dunes.
There is nothing to be afraid of.
Now, why do not you change into your bikini, Nana-chan?
If you are scared, we can stop here.
I do not want to make you regret this.
Takahashi, I want to do something that will make us both happy.
I do not just want your body.
If you feel like you are pushing yourself even a little, then it is wrong.
I am not making a mistake.
This is bad... even I am starting to get nervous.
I see... so even guys get nervous.
If it hurts, please raise your right hand.
Are you a dentist or something?
I will not regret this at all.
There is no way I will.
I have someone I want to devote everything to.
Encountering him must have been destiny.
And if anyone says differently, I will not believe in destiny at all.
But even despite that, I wonder if I have been dreaming?
Or is this all just a dream that seems so realistic?
Why is he wearing a happi coat?
He was talking about something else when he wore the happi coat...
The words they say at weddings sure are nice, huh?
For a Christmas present... give me a promise.
Is this all just a dream?
I think this sorta hurts, Yano!
Just stick with it for now!
Think of something else right now!
Umm... like you are cramming your mouth full of those steamed meat buns you love so much.
Yeah, something full of happiness like that!
I will bring it with me, so sneak out of the house!
She must have seen my shoes!
I can never show my face in front of your mom ever again...
Should not something else be bugging you more?
After all, her coming home was the worst punch line ever...
It is just so like us.
Yeah, I am a guy, after all.
Anyway, Yano, you are dressed pretty lightly, are not you?
I made such a huge thing out of it, and now I look completely uncool.
And anyway, did not it feel like a play, with all of those overdramatic lines?
Is this supposed to be a theatre?
Who do you think you are?
I feel embarrassed about it now.
I am so glad the person I love is Yano.
But there is no chance that we will make this an anniversary, huh?
I did not even enter you!
Though, I think you know that yourself.
Will things be okay with your mom?
I will pretend like nothing happened.
Why did the old hag have to come home at a time like that?!
My house is no good at all!
Up until now, I have just thought of sex as a sport!
Last night, he came over to my place and said that with a straight face.
Does he have a loose screw or something?
Is he really that into his current girlfriend?
Did he have sex with Takahashi?
I have never seen her before.
Ah... I saw them walking and holding hands once, but...
She is so normal that you would be surprised.
But she is a good girl.
Well, is not it fine the way it is, though?
It means he is starting to heal from what happened with Nana-san, right?
But you know, the one left behind just has to keep living.
You should do more than just that.
You should have the time of your life.
Speaking of which, he had a couple screws loose when he was going out with Nana-san too, did not he?
A special bargain, just for you!
But you have to pay up-front.
You sure you are not overcharging?
I bought them for 14,000 yen, and they are practically right out of the box.
It is not expensive at all.
How many times have you worn them?
Clean them off with an eraser.
I will throw in a cap and this one-of-a-kind secret figure as a special service.
What is up with you, anyway?
What is going on over there?
What do you want to buy so badly?
I will not go any higher.
I could not even pay for a hotel room with that.
He is at the end of his rope.
If you were selling your One Stars, I would not mind paying 8,000 yen.
Does he stare at my feet?!
8,000 yen's too cheap in the first place, moron.
Then I will pay for them using my Internet account.
I need the cash right now.
I think you are the cruel one here, no matter how I look at it.
And I had my hair just right, too...
What do you mean, you had it just right?
Yano... there is some strange rumors going around.
That you have become a miser.
Are you saving up for a hotel room...?
Yeah... my house is just too dangerous.
And I do not know when my parents will be out again.
I have done a lot of thinking about it too, but...
Yeah... you are right, I guess.
Since we kind of rushed the other day...
If you are going out of your way, I would like to go somewhere like hot springs or the beach.
That way it will become a memory, right?
The hotel fee... the train fee...
And if it were Tokyo Disneyland, it would be even better!
H-How much would that all cost?
Let us both save up, little by little.
It might take some time, but I am sure we will double the happiness!
We will really both save up for it?
I will gamble on Takahashi's smile.
I wonder if it will take about half a year?
And it is really okay with you, right?
We will probably have enough in time for our graduation class trip...
I sorta feel like I am being gypped here.
How much have you saved so far?
Let us go see the fireworks this summer.
I want to go to the festival, the Kiri Festival, and the beach, all together with you!
Let us create a ton of memories together.
I do not really like the word memory.
In my Japanese class in elementary school, I read a story.
A story called What Color Was That Girl's Dress?
Two girls, named A and B are recalling an old story together.
They get into this discussion about a picture hanging on the wall of one of the staircase landings in their elementary school.
A picture of a girl picking flowers in front of a deep red sunset...
You are talking about the picture of the girl in a pretty yellow dress, right?
But then B says, No, the dress she was wearing was red, just like the sunset!
Alright, then why do not we go see for ourselves?
The two of them, filled with excitement, reached the old, nostalgic school building.
What color was that girl's dress?
It was just a black and white picture.
The dress that dark silhouette wore was scribbled completely black.
Yet in their memories, both bickering girls were sure that the dress in the picture had a color.
Thinking something has color when it does not, making things more dramatic than they really are, glorifying things...
It gives new, greater meaning than was actually there.
That is why I do not believe any of this talk about beautiful memories.
What do you believe in, then?
What is right in front of me now.
Nana, want to come shopping with me today?
I dropped her stuff all over the place!
She will get really mad at us.
I have a copy of this, too.
So Yamamoto-san also reads poetry books...
Nana, hurry up and give it!
She will not notice we dropped it, right?
W-What am I going to do?
I took it as soon as I saw it.
They are a little younger, and...
Kisetsu ga sukoshi ugoita ki ga suru
Futari no basu ha kawaranai machi
Mado no soto itsumo mitai ni miteru anata
Soshite watashi mo mane wo shiteiru
Nee futari ha onaji nano ka na?
Nee futari ha onaji nano ka na?
Anata no shisen ha i am about to, mienakute...
I feel like the seasons have changed slightly
and the sunbeams have thinned and will one day shift.
But I was relieved, knowing our bus
was riding through our unchanged city.
You always gaze up to me from outside my window
and I mimic you by doing the same
Hey, I wonder if we are both the same?
Even if the place we want to go to has gotten dull, it is all right.
Hey, I wonder if we are both the same?
I still feel love for you, but you are no longer looking at me.
What am I going to do?
Snooping around in other people's things...
Do not you want to know why Onee-chan...
